entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 60

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
